attributes.name: User Directory
attributes.summary:
## Overview
Create a comprehensive User Directory card for centralized user management and identity services in the Boxel framework. This card should provide complete user profile management with authentication integration, role-based access control, organizational hierarchy, and social features for enterprise and application user management.

## Core Fields

### Basic Identity
- **userId**: StringField - Unique system identifier
- **username**: StringField - Unique username for login
- **displayName**: StringField - Preferred display name
- **firstName**: StringField - Given name
- **lastName**: StringField - Family name
- **middleName**: StringField - Middle name or initial
- **preferredName**: StringField - Chosen or nickname
- **namePrefix**: StringField - Title prefix (Mr., Dr., etc.)
- **nameSuffix**: StringField - Name suffix (Jr., III, etc.)
- **fullName**: StringField - Complete formatted name (computed)

### Contact Information
- **emailAddressPrimary**: StringField - Primary email address
- **emailAddressSecondary**: StringField - Secondary email address
- **emailAddressWork**: StringField - Work email address
- **phoneNumberPrimary**: StringField - Primary phone number
- **phoneNumberMobile**: StringField - Mobile phone number
- **phoneNumberWork**: StringField - Work phone number
- **phoneNumberHome**: StringField - Home phone number
- **emergencyContact**: contains(EmergencyContactInfo) - Emergency contact details

### Profile Information
- **avatarUrl**: contains(ImageField) - Profile picture
- **biography**: MarkdownField - Personal or professional bio
- **jobTitle**: StringField - Current job title
- **department**: StringField - Organizational department
- **team**: StringField - Team or group assignment
- **manager**: linksTo(UserDirectory) - Direct manager
- **directReports**: linksToMany(UserDirectory) - Team members managed
- **location**: StringField - Primary work location
- **officeAddress**: contains(PostalAddress) - Office address

### Authentication & Security
- **passwordHash**: StringField - Encrypted password hash
- **lastPasswordChange**: DateTimeField - Password change timestamp
- **passwordExpiryDate**: DateField - Password expiration date
- **twoFactorEnabled**: BooleanField - 2FA authentication status
- **authenticationMethods**: containsMany(AuthMethod) - Available auth methods
- **securityQuestions**: containsMany(SecurityQuestion) - Recovery questions
- **lastLoginTimestamp**: DateTimeField - Most recent login
- **failedLoginAttempts**: NumberField - Recent failed login count
- **accountLocked**: BooleanField - Account lock status

### Authorization & Permissions
- **userRole**: StringField - Primary role assignment
- **additionalRoles**: containsMany(Role) - Secondary role assignments
- **permissions**: containsMany(Permission) - Specific permissions
- **accessLevel**: StringField - Security clearance level
- **groupMemberships**: containsMany(UserGroup) - Group assignments
- **applicationAccess**: containsMany(ApplicationAccess) - App-specific access
- **dataPermissions**: containsMany(DataPermission) - Data access rights
- **delegatedAuthority**: containsMany(DelegatedAuth) - Proxy permissions

### Organizational Context
- **employeeId**: StringField - HR employee identifier
- **costCenter**: StringField - Financial cost center
- **startDate**: DateField - Employment or account start date
- **endDate**: DateField - Employment or account end date
- **employmentStatus**: StringField - Active, inactive, terminated
- **contractType**: StringField - Full-time, part-time, contractor
- **organizationalUnit**: StringField - Organizational division
- **reportingStructure**: contains(ReportingChain) - Hierarchy information

### Preferences & Settings
- **languagePreference**: StringField - Preferred interface language
- **timezonePreference**: StringField - User's timezone
- **dateFormatPreference**: StringField - Preferred date format
- **timeFormatPreference**: StringField - 12-hour or 24-hour time
- **themePreference**: StringField - Light, dark, or auto theme
- **notificationPreferences**: contains(NotificationSettings) - Alert preferences
- **privacySettings**: contains(PrivacySettings) - Privacy configuration
- **accessibility**: contains(AccessibilitySettings) - Accessibility options

### Activity & Engagement
- **lastActivityTimestamp**: DateTimeField - Last system activity
- **activityScore**: NumberField - Engagement score
- **loginFrequency**: NumberField - Average logins per period
- **featureUsage**: containsMany(FeatureUsage) - Application feature usage
- **collaborationMetrics**: contains(CollaborationStats) - Team interaction stats
- **contentContributions**: NumberField - Content creation count
- **helpDeskTickets**: NumberField - Support ticket count
- **trainingCompleted**: containsMany(TrainingRecord) - Completed training

### Social & Professional
- **skills**: containsMany(Skill) - Professional skills and competencies
- **certifications**: containsMany(Certification) - Professional certifications
- **education**: containsMany(Education) - Educational background
- **workExperience**: containsMany(WorkExperience) - Employment history
- **projects**: containsMany(ProjectParticipation) - Project involvement
- **achievements**: containsMany(Achievement) - Recognition and awards
- **interests**: containsMany(Interest) - Personal and professional interests
- **socialLinks**: containsMany(SocialLink) - Social media profiles

### Integration & External Systems
- **externalIds**: containsMany(ExternalId) - IDs in external systems
- **activeDirectoryId**: StringField - AD/LDAP identifier
- **ssoProviderIds**: containsMany(SSOId) - Single sign-on identifiers
- **apiKeys**: containsMany(APIKey) - Personal API keys
- **webhookEndpoints**: containsMany(WebhookEndpoint) - Personal webhooks
- **thirdPartyConnections**: containsMany(Integration) - Connected services
- **dataExports**: containsMany(DataExport) - User data export requests

### Compliance & Audit
- **gdprConsent**: contains(GDPRConsent) - Privacy consent records
- **dataProcessingAgreements**: containsMany(DPA) - Data processing consents
- **accessAuditLog**: containsMany(AccessLog) - Access attempt records
- **changeAuditLog**: containsMany(ChangeLog) - Profile change history
- **complianceFlags**: containsMany(ComplianceFlag) - Regulatory markers
- **retentionPolicies**: containsMany(RetentionPolicy) - Data retention rules
- **rightToErasure**: DateField - Data deletion request date

## Required Component Cards

### Role Card
Create a separate Role card with:
- **roleName**: StringField - Role title
- **roleDescription**: MarkdownField - Role responsibilities
- **permissions**: containsMany(Permission) - Associated permissions
- **inheritedRoles**: containsMany(Role) - Parent roles
- **applicableScopes**: containsMany(Scope) - Where role applies
- **minimumClearance**: StringField - Required security level
- **expirationPeriod**: NumberField - Role validity period
- **approvalRequired**: BooleanField - Requires approval for assignment
- **autoAssignmentRules**: containsMany(AutoAssignRule) - Automatic assignment

### Permission Card
- **permissionName**: StringField - Permission identifier
- **permissionType**: StringField - Read, write, admin, execute
- **resourceType**: StringField - What resource this affects
- **scope**: StringField - Global, organizational, personal
- **conditions**: containsMany(PermissionCondition) - Conditional access
- **inheritanceRules**: StringField - How permission inherits
- **expirationDate**: DateField - Permission expiry
- **grantedBy**: linksTo(UserDirectory) - Who granted permission
- **auditRequired**: BooleanField - Requires audit logging

### UserGroup Card
- **groupName**: StringField - Group identifier
- **groupType**: StringField - Department, project, security, interest
- **description**: MarkdownField - Group purpose and description
- **members**: linksToMany(UserDirectory) - Group members
- **administrators**: linksToMany(UserDirectory) - Group admins
- **joinPolicy**: StringField - Open, approval required, invitation only
- **privacyLevel**: StringField - Public, private, secret
- **parentGroup**: linksTo(UserGroup) - Parent group if hierarchical
- **childGroups**: linksToMany(UserGroup) - Subgroups

## Computed Fields Logic

### Organizational Hierarchy
Calculate reporting chain depth and span of control.

### Access Level Assessment
Determine effective permissions based on roles and group memberships.

### Activity Score
Compute engagement score based on login frequency and feature usage.

### Profile Completeness
Calculate percentage of completed profile fields.

## Card Layout Design

### Isolated/Embedded View Layout
Design a comprehensive user management interface:

**Header Section**
- User avatar and display name prominently displayed
- Online status indicator and last activity
- Quick contact options (email, phone, message)
- Role and department information
- Account status and verification badges

**Profile Information Panel**
- **Personal Details**:
  - Contact information
  - Location and timezone
  - Personal bio and interests
  - Social media links
  - Emergency contact info
  
- **Professional Information**:
  - Job title and department
  - Reporting structure
  - Skills and certifications
  - Project participation
  - Performance metrics

**Security & Access Management**
- Authentication status and methods
- Role and permission assignments
- Group memberships
- Security clearance level
- Recent security events

**Activity & Engagement**
- Login and activity patterns
- Feature usage statistics
- Collaboration metrics
- Content contributions
- Training progress

**Administrative Tools**
- Account management actions
- Permission modification
- Audit log access
- Compliance status
- Data export options

### Directory Browser View
- Searchable user list
- Organizational chart navigation
- Advanced filtering options
- Bulk operations interface
- Export and reporting tools

### Self-Service Profile View
- Editable personal information
- Privacy and notification settings
- Password and security management
- Connected accounts and integrations
- Data download and deletion options

## Interactive Features

### Search & Discovery
- Advanced user search with filters
- Organizational chart navigation
- Skill and expertise finding
- Team and project member discovery
- Directory browsing by department

### Communication Integration
- Direct messaging capabilities
- Email composition shortcuts
- Video call initiation
- Calendar availability checking
- Meeting scheduling integration

### Administrative Management
- Bulk user operations
- Role and permission management
- Group administration
- Security policy enforcement
- Compliance monitoring

## Styling Requirements
- Professional business interface design
- Consistent avatar and photo handling
- Hierarchical organization visualization
- Status indicators and badges
- Mobile-responsive design
- Accessibility compliance
- Multi-cultural name handling
- Privacy-conscious information display

## Validation Rules
- Unique username and email enforcement
- Contact information format validation
- Role assignment authorization checking
- Security policy compliance verification
- Data privacy regulation adherence
- Password complexity requirements
- Permission hierarchy validation
- Organizational structure consistency

## Integration Points
- **Identity Providers**: Active Directory, LDAP, SAML, OAuth
- **HR Systems**: Workday, BambooHR, ADP, SuccessFactors
- **Communication**: Slack, Microsoft Teams, Google Workspace
- **Security**: Okta, Auth0, Azure AD, AWS Cognito
- **Analytics**: User behavior tracking, engagement metrics
- **Compliance**: GDPR, CCPA, HIPAA compliance tools
- **Directory Services**: Corporate directory synchronization
- **Single Sign-On**: SSO provider integration
- **Audit Systems**: Security information and event management
- **Workflow**: Approval and provisioning workflows

## Business Logic Requirements
- Automated user provisioning and deprovisioning workflows
- Role-based access control with inheritance and delegation
- Identity federation and single sign-on integration
- Comprehensive audit logging and compliance reporting
- Self-service profile management with approval workflows
- Organizational hierarchy management and visualization
- Security policy enforcement and monitoring
- Privacy controls and data protection compliance
- Integration with external identity and HR systems
- Scalable directory services for large organizations
- Real-time synchronization with authoritative sources
- Emergency access procedures and account recovery
- Performance monitoring and capacity planning
- Mobile device management and security integration
